ygData.subject: Re: [cantera] Installation suse 10.1
ygData.msgSnippet: I have run into this problem before.  A quick fix is to change the line 685 in ChemEquil.cpp from scale(x, damp); to scale(x.begin(),x.end(),x.begin(),damp);

I have run into this problem before.  A quick fix is to change the  
line 685 in ChemEquil.cpp from
         scale(x, damp);
	to
         scale(x.begin(),x.end(),x.begin(),damp);
For some reason, the two argument scale function messes up the  
compiler.  I've only had this problem using g++.

Karl

On Aug 9, 2006, at 6:31 AM, scheskis wrote:

> I am trying to install Cantera on my laptop with suse 10.1 linux. The
> following error was recieved in "make"
>
> g++ -c ChemEquil.cpp -I. -O3 -Wall
> ChemEquil.h: In instantiation of
> `Cantera::PropertyCalculator<Cantera::ThermoPhase>':
> ChemEquil.cpp:59: instantiated from here
> ChemEquil.h:66: warning: `struct
> Cantera::PropertyCalculator<Cantera::ThermoPhase>' has virtual
> functions but non-virtual destructor
> PropertyCalculator.h: In instantiation of
> `Cantera::TemperatureCalculator<Cantera::ThermoPhase>':
> ChemEquil.cpp:327: instantiated from here
> PropertyCalculator.h:48: warning: `class
> Cantera::TemperatureCalculator<Cantera::ThermoPhase>' has virtual
> functions but non-virtual destructor
> PropertyCalculator.h: In instantiation of
> `Cantera::PressureCalculator<Cantera::ThermoPhase>':
> ChemEquil.cpp:328: instantiated from here
> PropertyCalculator.h:57: warning: `class
> Cantera::PressureCalculator<Cantera::ThermoPhase>' has virtual
> functions but non-virtual destructor
> PropertyCalculator.h: In instantiation of
> `Cantera::EnthalpyCalculator<Cantera::ThermoPhase>':
> ChemEquil.cpp:332: instantiated from here
> PropertyCalculator.h:30: warning: `class
> Cantera::EnthalpyCalculator<Cantera::ThermoPhase>' has virtual
> functions but non-virtual destructor
> PropertyCalculator.h: In instantiation of
> `Cantera::EntropyCalculator<Cantera::ThermoPhase>':
> ChemEquil.cpp:337: instantiated from here
> PropertyCalculator.h:39: warning: `class
> Cantera::EntropyCalculator<Cantera::ThermoPhase>' has virtual
> functions but non-virtual destructor
> PropertyCalculator.h: In instantiation of
> `Cantera::DensityCalculator<Cantera::ThermoPhase>':
> ChemEquil.cpp:343: instantiated from here
> PropertyCalculator.h:66: warning: `class
> Cantera::DensityCalculator<Cantera::ThermoPhase>' has virtual
> functions but non-virtual destructor
> PropertyCalculator.h: In instantiation of
> `Cantera::IntEnergyCalculator<Cantera::ThermoPhase>':
> ChemEquil.cpp:351: instantiated from here
> PropertyCalculator.h:75: warning: `class
> Cantera::IntEnergyCalculator<Cantera::ThermoPhase>' has virtual
> functions but non-virtual destructor
> vec_functions.h: In function `void Cantera::scale(T&, S) [with T =
> ct::ctvector_fp, S = double]':
> ChemEquil.cpp:685: instantiated from here
> vec_functions.h:59: error: no matching function for call to
> `scale(doublereal*, doublereal*, doublereal*, double&)'
> make[1]: *** [ChemEquil.o] Error 1
> make[1]: Leaving directory `/home/sergey/src/cantera-1.6.0r2/ 
> Cantera/src'
> make: *** [kernel] Error 2
>
> I would appreciate very much receiving any help
> Sergey
>
>
>  -->


--Apple-Mail-1-730504155
